alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 3:01PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central St. Louis County through 330 PM CDT... At 301 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gilbert, or 27 miles east of Hibbing, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Biwabik around 315 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Aurora. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
